project1.title: Pardon Us Band Website
project1.description: This was a group project to create a website for the punk rock band, Pardon Us. I contributed the background image with parallox scrolling on all pages except home.  I also contributed the music page with a card printing function and animation to hide and display additional content.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
